description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Ice Cream Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Christmas pudding,Strawberry,High protein,Seafood free,Low salt,Christmas,Soy free,Egg free
name: Christmas Ice Cream Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly grease and line a 10cup capacity glass bowl with plastic wrap.
Remove 2 cartons of icecream from freezer and stand at room temperature until softened. Do not melt completely.

Spoon into a large bowl. Add cherries, pistachios and stir until well combined. Transfer to prepared bowl, spreading around over the surface and leaving the centre empty. Lightly brush the outside of a 4cup capacity bowl with oil. Place into the centre of the larger ice-cream lined bowl. Freeze for about 1 1/2 hours or until very firm.
Remove inner bowl and return large bowl to freezer. Remove the remaining carton of icecream from freezer and stand until softened.

Place strawberries, raspberries and icing sugar into a food processor. Process to a purée. Transfer softened ice cream to a large bowl. Add puréed fruit and stir well to combine. Spoon into the cavity formed by the smaller bowl. Return to the freezer until solid.
To serve: Remove from freezer and place bowl upside down onto serving platter. Rub a warm wet cloth over outside bowl to loosen. Gently ease pudding from bowl. Remove plastic wrap.
Decorate with strawberries and dust with icing sugar.
